sentences.sContent: This is an arena for gladiators only, for the Titans of the track.
sentences.sCn: 这是个仅为勇士而且是仅为此行里的大力士勇士所设的竞技场。

synos.tran: 斗剑者；古罗马公开表演的格斗者；争论者

remMethod.val: 来自gladius(n. 古罗马军队之短剑)

trans.tranCn: 角斗士， 与野兽搏斗者
trans.tranOther: a soldier who fought against other men or wild animals as an entertainment in ancient Rome
